Description: Authentic Man by Abercrombie & Fitch is a Citrus Aromatic fragrance for men. Authentic Man was launched in 2019. The nose behind this fragrance is Clement Gavarry. Top notes are Grapefruit, Bergamot and Pink Pepper; middle notes are Ginger, Sage and Lavender; base notes are Clearwood, Suede and Moss.
